card.name: Pilot
card.text: This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.

card.name: Gear
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Untap target nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: The Core
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures attacking a player that has The Core aren’t blocked, their controller seizes The Core. (This triggers after blockers are declared.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have The Core, seize The Core. To seize The Core, choose one — • You get {E}. • Surveil 1.

card.name: Vryn Draft Archetypes
card.text: WU SEIZE THE CORE Seize Vryn itself. Gain a steady stream of energy. And play tempo cards to level the playing field. BU COVERT CONSORTIUM Hit your opponents with sneaky creatures to uncover your opponents doom. BR VEHICLE MAVERICKS Run over your opponent with Vehicles and use crewing creatures as cannon fodder. RG ENERGIZED KICKER Accumulate energy and spend it to kick your spells into overdrive. GW TEACH ABILITIES Modify your creatures with ability counters. Attack with big creatures. WB PHYREXIAN ENTER THE BATTLEFIELD Reanimate and flicker your creatures to bury your opponent under a pile of value. UR WIZARDS FROM EXILE Rebound is back. Combine it with impulse effects and other cast from exile synergies to show your spellcasting domination. GB LEAVE THE GRAVE Make your cards leave the graveyard and get reward for it. RW INSPIRED GEARS Attack your opponent with inspired creatures and double up on your value by cracking some gears. UG ENGROSS FLASH Cast versatile spells during your opponents turn and disrupt them with counter-magic and spells with flash.

card.name: Spirit
card.text: Decayed (This creature can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: The Core1
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures attacking a player that has The Core aren’t blocked, their controller seizes The Core. (This triggers after blockers are declared.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have The Core, seize The Core. To seize The Core, choose one — • You get {E}. • Surveil 1.

card.name: Wizard
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast creature spells.

card.name: Treasure
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Copy
card.text: This token can be used to represent a token that’s a copy of a permanent.

card.name: Mara, Hand of the Core Emblem
card.text: Pay {E}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Elemental
card.text: Trample, haste Decayed (This creature can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: The Hexchaser
card.text: Whenever this Vehicle attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Charim Kosta, Planeswalker Emblem
card.text: The first time one or more Vehicles you control deal combat damage to a player each turn, there’s an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.
